span.span: Please click here for March 17, 2020, Income Tax Levy Information

p.span: 1. Make every decision with the best interest of our kids first.
2. Use evidence-based and data supported methods of instruction to meet every child's specific learning needs and goals.
3. Work with our local stakeholders to develop local policies and practices that support and reflect the specific current and future needs and desires of the community.
4. Take calculated and concentrated actions to increase the literacy and math outcomes for all students K-12.

span.b: for directions to complete your IPDP and Professional Development Goals.
